parameters.name: heliographicLatitude
parameters.description: HelioGraphic Inertial (HGI) latitude of the spacecraft position

parameters.name: heliographicLongitude
parameters.description: HelioGraphic Inertial (HGI) longitude of the spacecraft position

parameters.name: BR
parameters.description: IMF BR in RTN (Radial-Tangential-Normal) coordinate system

parameters.name: BT
parameters.description: IMF BT in RTN coordinate system

parameters.name: BN
parameters.description: IMF BN in RTN coordinate system

parameters.name: VR
parameters.description: Proton VR in RTN (Radial-Tangential-Normal) coordinate system

parameters.name: VT
parameters.description: Proton VT in RTN coordinate system

parameters.name: VN
parameters.description: Proton VN in RTN coordinate system

parameters.name: flow_theta
parameters.description: Flow elevation angle in RTN coordinate system

parameters.name: flow_lon
parameters.description: Flow azimuth angle in RTN coordinate system
